meaning_str.bing:
n. 健身房；体育馆；（尤指学校的）体育活动
网络. 健身中心；体操；健身馆

健身房；体育馆；（尤指学校的）体育活动

健身房；体育馆；体操馆；运动馆；体育课；（尤指学校的） 体操；（尤指学校的）体育活动

1.en: I didn't even care at this point, the only thing in my mind was that there was a gym downstairs, and she ought to go and work out.
1.cn: 我什至没有在这一点照顾，在我的心中只有是，楼下有一个健身房，她应该去工作了。

2.en: If you want a young person to focus intently in school and perform well on tests, should you first send him or her to gym class?
2.cn: 如果想让孩子在课堂上专心上课，考试取得好成绩，你首先会想到送TA去上体育课吗？

3.en: Today, a lady walked up to me in the gym and asked me to give her some workout pointers.
3.cn: 今天，在健身房一个女士向我走来，问我能否给她一些指导。

0.en: Going to the gym. Run off some of this stress.
0.cn: 我要去健身房。跑步消解压力。

1.en: Oh, I love your neighborhood. There's a great gym right around the corner from your building. That's my gym.
1.cn: 我喜欢你住的社区，街角有家很棒的健身房。那是我的健身房。

2.en: Girls, if you need a shower, there are wonderful facilities at my new gym. Well, they obviously have child care.
2.cn: 姑娘们，如果你们需要洗澡，我新去的健身房里的设备很棒哦。那家健身房明显有托儿所啊。

3.en: He isn't home from the gym yet. Usually you call us in the morning.
3.cn: 他还没从健身房回来，你通常都是早上打电话。

4.en: This is gonna be so much more accurate than the steam room at the gym.
4.cn: 这个会比健身房里的桑拿房更接近真实环境吧。

5.en: If I weren't doing this, I'd just, you know, be at the gym working out.
5.cn: 如果我没有这样做，反正我也只是在健身房健身而已。

6.en: Oh please. Dad turned my room into a gym 20 minutes after I moved out.
6.cn: 拜托，我搬出来二十分钟后，爸就把我的房间变成健身房。

7.en: Well sweetie, we have a surprise for you. We're turning your room into a gym.
7.cn: 亲爱的，我们要给你一个惊喜，你房间要改成健身房了。

8.en: I gotta say, a tanning bed and a stack of Victoria's Secret catalogues, not a gym.
8.cn: 一张日光浴椅跟一堆 《维多利亚的秘密》的目录，那不是健身房。

9.en: So this is your office. How'd you guys find me? I knew I should've hid at the gym.
9.cn: 原来这就是你的办公室。你们怎么找到我的？我就知道我该躲在健身房。

10.en: Mrs. Sheep, do you work or do you play? I'm going to be working very hard today. I'm off to the gym.
10.cn: 羊女士，你要工作吗，还是只要玩？我今天会非常努力的工作的，我一会去健身房。

11.en: Mrs. Sheep, do you work or do you play? I'm going to be working very hard today. I'm off to the gym.
11.cn: 羊女士。你要工作吗，还是只要玩？我今天会非常努力的工作的，我一会去健身房。

12.en: Gym? Two. Gay Jim upstairs, and straight Jim across the hall who's only gay when he's drunk.
12.cn: "健身房"呢？俩，楼上的基佬阿"健"以及对门的直男阿"健"，他只有喝醉时才是基佬。

13.en: What do you do at the gym? Running, jumping and skipping. Mummy, that's not work. That's play.
13.cn: 你在健身房里干什么呢？跑步，跳高，还有跳绳。妈妈，你这可不算是工作，你这是在玩儿。

14.en: What do you do at the gym? Running, jumping and skipping. Mummy, that's not work. That's play.
14.cn: 你在健身房里干什么呢？跑步，跳高，还有跳绳。妈妈，你这可不算是工作，你这是在玩儿。

15.en: Hey, they're going to the gym together. Two women. Stretching. You know they take a steam together. Things get a little playful.
15.cn: 她们一起上健身房耶，两个女人，劈腿拉筋，她们洗蒸汽浴，开始互相逗弄。

16.en: We can make it really uncomfortable for you at the gym, and people are already talking about your discount yoga pants. So yeah.
16.cn: 我们能让你在健身房的日子很不好过，人们已经开始议论你的打折瑜伽裤了，所以，你懂的。

17.en: Daddy, why are you buying an ice-cream? Oh, Peppa, I was on the way to the gym. Well I thought an ice-cream would be nice.
17.cn: 爸爸，你为什么会去买冰淇淋呢？哦，佩奇，我本来要去健身房的。后来觉得买个冰淇淋也不错。

18.en: Miss rabbit's ice-cream store. Daddy, why are you buying an ice-cream? Oh, Peppa, I was on the way to the gym. Well I thought an ice-Cream would be nice.
18.cn: 这里是兔小姐的冰淇淋店。爸爸，你为什么会去买冰淇淋呢。哦，佩奇，我本来要去健身房的。后来觉得买个冰淇淋也不错。

19.en: There's all kinds of gays. You've got your broadway gays, your gym gays, your twinks, your bears, your otters, your "Hey, girl" Gays. You've got your pups, your cubs, your chubs.
19.cn: 这世上有各种各样的基佬，百老汇基佬，健身房基佬，小鲜肉基佬，熊基佬，水獭基佬，"妞儿好啊"类型的基佬，小狗基佬，幼兽基佬，白鲑基佬。
